experiences.description: A passionate and detail-oriented front-end developer specializing in Angular, dedicated to building responsive, scalable, and high-performance web applications. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, with a strong commitment to learning new technologies and delivering outstanding user experiences.

I streamlined the WordPress-to-Next.js workflow using ACF-based REST APIs, automating page creation and cutting publishing effort by over 60%. I also integrated Zoho Forms with automated handling and UX-optimized placement, boosting qualified leads by 30%. Additionally, I built Core Web Vitalsâ€“optimized Next.js landing pages to improve SEO and conversions.

I developed a custom Node.js script to detect broken links and generate QA-ready CSV reports, improving quality checks. Beyond my primary role, I actively contributed across frontend, backend, and deployment to ensure smooth end-to-end delivery.

Completed the Fellowship Full Stack program, gaining hands-on experience in designing, developing, and deploying full-stack web applications. Built multiple industry-relevant projects, following best coding practices, API development, and UI/UX improvements.
